rescript.settings.allowBuiltInFormatter.description: Whether you want to allow the extension to format your code using its built in formatter when it cannot find a ReScript compiler version in your current project to use for formatting.

rescript.settings.askToStartBuild.description: Whether you want the extension to prompt for autostarting a ReScript build if a project is opened with no build running.

rescript.settings.binaryPath.description: Path to the directory where cross-platform ReScript binaries are. You can use it if you haven't or don't want to use the installed ReScript from node_modules in your project.

rescript.settings.cache.projectConfig.en.description: (beta/experimental) Enable project config caching. Can speed up latency dramatically.

rescript.settings.codeLens.description: Enable (experimental) code lens for function definitions.

rescript.settings.incrementalTypecheckin.description: (beta/experimental) Enable incremental type checking across files, so that unsaved file A gets access to unsaved file B.
(debug) Enable debug logging (ends up in the extension output).

rescript.settings.inlayHints.maxLength.markdownDescription: Maximum length of character for inlay hints. Set to null to have an unlimited length. Inlay hints that exceed the maximum length will not be shown.

rescript.settings.platformPath.description: Path to the directory where platform-specific ReScript binaries are. You can use it if you haven't or don't want to use the installed ReScript from node_modules in your project.

rescript.settings.signatureHelp.enabled.description: Enable signature help for function calls.

rescript.settings.signatureHelp.forConst.description: Enable signature help for variant constructor payloads.
